testsuite.name: JenkinsFileTest

testcase.name: test order of steps in jenkins file

testsuite.system-out: JenkinsFile.run() JenkinsFile.execute() JenkinsFile.node(groovy.lang.Closure) JenkinsFile.stage(build, groovy.lang.Closure) JenkinsFile.sh(./gradlew clean build) JenkinsFile.stage(test, groovy.lang.Closure) JenkinsFile.sh(./gradlew test) JenkinsFile.run() JenkinsFile.execute() JenkinsFile.node(groovy.lang.Closure) JenkinsFile.stage(build, groovy.lang.Closure) JenkinsFile.sh(./gradlew clean build) JenkinsFile.stage(test, groovy.lang.Closure) JenkinsFile.sh(./gradlew test)
